backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing emergency services tracking with user profiles (ambulance/police roles), real-time location updates, SOS alerts, and distance calculations using the Haversine formula, plus role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented error logging, loading fallbacks, error boundaries, defensive null checks, and Leaflet CDN verification to prevent blank white screen issues in production.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, pages, and utilities with details on authentication flow, profile management, map rendering, location tracking, and error handling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining light/dark theme variables including custom emergency-red and emergency-blue colors for the emergency services aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Leaflet CSS/JS from CDN with onload/onerror handlers that log loading status and set window.leafletLoaded flag for runtime verification.
frontend/project_state.json: Project metadata documenting known transient production deployment errors on Internet Computer network with mitigation strategy to retry after 30-60 seconds.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component orchestrating authentication via Internet Identity, user profile loading, role-based routing to ambulance/police interfaces, and comprehensive error handling with loading states and ErrorState component.
frontend/src/components/CrashFallback.ts: Error fallback UI component displaying application crash details with expandable technical error information and a reload button for recovery.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches component errors, logs them to console, and renders a CrashFallback component when errors occur.
frontend/src/components/ErrorState.tsx: Displays a full-screen error UI with an alert, optional technical details in a collapsible section, and retry/reload buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright text with a heart icon and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header showing branding, user profile info (name and role badge), logout button, and controls for sharing and domain info.
frontend/src/components/LinkDomainInfoPa: Dialog component that displays the current app URL and provides information about custom domain configuration and troubleshooting production publish failures.
Full-screen loading spinner component with an optional message, styled with gradient background.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen with emergency response branding that prompts users to authenticate via Internet Identity, showing ambulance and police role icons.
frontend/src/components/PhoneNumberCaptu: Form component for capturing and validating a 10-digit phone number from users who already have a profile but are missing phone information.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Initial profile setup form where new users enter their name, 10-digit phone number, and select their role (ambulance or police).
frontend/src/components/RealtimeMap.tsx: Leaflet-based map component that displays real-time markers (ambulance, police, SOS) with smooth coordinate transitions and in-place marker updates to avoid re-rendering.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCont: Button component that copies the app share URL to clipboard with fallback UI for manual copy if the Clipboard API fails.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication and admin token initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTokenInitiali: Hook that initializes admin access control once per session using a token from URL parameters when actor and identity are ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including user profiles, ambulance/police locations, SOS alerts, and ambulance contacts with proper error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, emergency color palette (red/blue), and gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceInterface.ts: Ambulance interface page that tracks GPS location, sends periodic updates to backend, and allows triggering/deactivating SOS alerts with a 60-second timer. Implements GPS accuracy filtering, outlier detection, and location smoothing for both map display and backend updates.
frontend/src/pages/PoliceInterface.tsx: Police dashboard that displays all ambulance locations on a map with real-time tracking, shows active SOS alerts, and provides navigation links to ambulances. Includes filtering for online/offline ambulances based on a 1-minute threshold.
frontend/src/types/leaflet-global.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file that adds type definitions for the global Leaflet object (window.L) to enable type checking for the Leaflet mapping library.
frontend/src/utils/getShareUrl.ts: Utility function that returns the complete shareable URL of the current page including origin, pathname, search parameters, and hash.
frontend/src/utils/leafletMarkers.ts: Provides utilities for creating and managing Leaflet map markers with custom icons for ambulance, police, and SOS marker types, including icon configuration and change detection.
frontend/src/utils/locationRefresh.ts: Defines shared constants for location update intervals (12 seconds) and police radius (50 meters), plus formatting utilities for displaying distances and radii in meters or kilometers.
frontend/src/utils/locationSmoothing.ts: Implements GPS location smoothing algorithms including Haversine distance calculation, low-pass filtering, outlier detection, and separate smoothing configurations for map display versus backend updates to reduce jitter and improve accuracy.
frontend/src/utils/mapsDirections.ts: Builds Google Maps directions URLs for navigation with optional origin coordinates, defaulting to user's current location if origin is not provided.
frontend/src/utils/phoneValidation.ts: Provides phone number validation utilities that enforce exactly 10 digits, normalize input to digits only, and generate user-friendly validation error messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear sensitive parameters from the URL after extraction.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette using OKLCH color space, extended theme with sidebar/chart/emergency colors, container queries, typography, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking a fix for blank white screen in production, with 5 existing features focused on error logging, loading UI, error boundaries, defensive checks, and CDN verification.
